title: Lovely 2-Bedroom Duplex near Columbia University
map_address: Broadway near La Salle St and Broadway
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 235623518', 'Rent: $2,895 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 07/26/2022', 'Full 2 bedroom/2bath Duplex 5 that is an easy minute stroll to the Manhattan School of Music or 7 minutes to Barnard or 10 minutes to Columbia’s Main Campus.', 'At the corner of La Salle & Broadway – renovated kitchen with a dishwasher, large living room, and plenty of light.', 'hardwood floors on the first floor.', 'The lower level is above ground with windows, and tiles on the lower level.', 'Walk-in closet on the lower level.', '1 bathroom on each floor, first-floor full bath.', '5 min walk to Columbia campus.', 'Areas of Interest: Columbia University, Riverside Park, Morningside Park, The Cathedral of St. John the Divine, Dinosaur BBQ, Fairway Food Market, Manhattan School of Music', "Welcome to the heart of everything, home to some of New York's finest art and most impressive architecture, world famous cathedrals and the gorgeous Grand Central Terminal; the hub of the neighborhood and arguably the city.", 'Great nightlife and restaurants line 2nd', 'Avenue, while tranquility settles in a little further east.', "Seconds away from Central Park, make the world's most famous park, your backyard!"]
